concept.title: Couchnode overview
concept.shortdesc: The Couchbase Node.js SDK, known as Couchnode, enables you to interact with Couchbase Server from a Node.js application.

conbody.p: Couchnode consists of a native JavaScript library and a C/C++ add-on that uses the Couchbase C SDK (libcouchbase) internally. The Couchnode SDK includes the following components:

section.title: Contributing
section.p: Couchbase welcomes community contributions to Couchnode. The Couchnode source code is available on GitHub. If you would like to contribute code, read the contributor's guide for details.
